body.p: It gives me great pleasure to make you acquainted with my friend J. P. Harrison, who will hand you this letter.
Mr Harrison is a member of our bar in this City a worthy & estimable gentleman, & I beg leave to commend him to your favourable notice & regard.

Very truly yours
J. W Stevenson

Gov. B Magoffin Eqr
Frankfort
Ky

Hon B Magoffin
Governor of the state of Kentucky
Present
